Summary: I am sorry, but the reviews do not contain information about a stylish atmosphere. The hotel is described as a "great little hotel" and a "little gem."

414 Hotel is a stylish small hotel with rooms decorated with striking photographic cityscapes, natural fiber sheets, and white down comforters. The lobby has a long attractively stained table brightened by flowers and a motif of historic photos of NYC.

60 Thompson is a modern, stylish boutique hotel with a hip atmosphere, a rooftop bar with city views, a chic lobby bar, and a restaurant; rooms feature amenities like flat-screen TVs and Fresh brand toiletries. The hotel's design includes dark wood, and marble bathrooms, but some find the rooms small and that it's located in a quiet area.

6 Columbus is a modern, trendy boutique hotel with a sleek and attractive design, though some find the interior to be dark. The hotel features a Japanese-inspired restaurant and bar with a hip atmosphere, as well as amenities like iPod docking stations and heated bathroom floors in some rooms.
70 Park Avenue is a stylish boutique hotel with modern, well-appointed rooms and a trendy bar. The hotel also has a small and quaint lobby.
The Ace Hotel has a funky, hipster vibe with a beautiful lobby and bar. The hotel rooms have a masculine decor with reclaimed furniture and accessories.
The Affinia 50 is a modern, classy, and swanky hotel with a stylish lobby, comfortable club room, a water-wall, and orchids. Decor is modern, with spacious suites and a boutique-y feel.
The Affinia Dumont features a chic, modern design and a tranquil, flower-scented lobby. Rooms include marble flooring, updated furniture, and views of the Chrysler and other notable buildings.

The Affinia Gardens (formerly Lyden Gardens) is a stylish hotel with modern furnishings, a zen-like atmosphere, a tea bar in the lobby, and spacious rooms. It promotes a zen-like philosophy and offers herbal teas in the lobby.
The hotel has a grand lobby with marble and chandeliers and a modern bar, though some guests found the unrenovated rooms to be outdated. Some reviewers describe it as having an Art Deco theme.

The Affinia Shelburne features modern and chic decor after recent renovations, with groovy atmospheres in the Rare bar/restaurant and luxury touches such as Aveda bath amenities. Some rooms have Empire State Building views, and a rooftop bar is available.

AKA United Nations offers modern and luxurious apartments with semi-furnished kitchens, separate lounge areas, and modern d√©cor. The hotel provides complimentary breakfast on weekdays, access to a 24-hour gym, and is located near a corner store and the UN Headquarters.

The Algonquin Hotel has an old New York feel with a classic boutique style, art deco character, a lively lobby, and New Yorker cartoon wallpaper. Some found the public areas elegant with a feeling of a private members club, others found the antique furniture and style of the Lobby dark and old.
I am sorry, but this hotel has very few reviews that mention anything about style. The vast majority of reviews focus on its budget price, cleanliness and convenient location.
The Amsterdam Court Hotel features modern rooms with a snappy lobby, and a trendy bar. It is a boutique hotel with European ambiance, and Art Deco style, but some find it dimly lit.

Astor on the Park is a basic, older building with small rooms and minimalist accommodations, similar to European hotels. It is clean with refurbished bathrooms and air conditioning, but offers no amenities other than a reception area, drinks machine, and internet station.
The hotel is described as 'boutique' in style, cozy and charming, with a nicely decorated lobby. Some reviewers note that the rooms are a bit old and worn.

The Beekman Tower is an Art Deco style hotel with a restaurant and bar on the top floor that has great views; some rooms feature Art Deco decor. The hotel was originally built for use by sororities of US Women's Universities and has been described as having a "genteel feel."

The Belleclaire Hotel features a stylish and comfortable atmosphere with modern, sleek rooms, flat-screen TVs, iPod docking stations, and well-stocked bathrooms, appealing to those seeking a hip, residential vibe on the Upper West Side. Its European-inspired design and recent renovations contribute to its charm.
The Bentley Hotel has a modern and stylish atmosphere with a candlelit lobby, and the rooms feature a modern design with flat-screen TVs. It also has a rooftop bar with skyline views.
The hotel is described as stylish and modern with laminate-wood floors and flat-panel TVs. Some reviewers describe the hotel as having a boutique feel.
Rooms are modern, clean, and small, with granite floors in the bathroom. Some reviewers describe the hotel as having a "boutique" feeling and note its newness.

This hotel does not have a stylish atmosphere, with many reviewers citing that the decor is old-fashioned, shabby, and not luxurious, but clean. The building is a converted apartment complex, offering apartment-style rooms with kitchens.

The hotel is described as charming and tastefully decorated with a nice seating area in the lobby and prints of historic etchings of the neighborhood. The hotel is located in a quaint area with cobblestone streets.

The Blue Moon Hotel is a renovated tenement building with artistic decor, original woodwork, and rooms named after 1930s/40s celebrities. It features a lobby with artsy paintings, decorative floor tiles, and cozy seating areas.
I am sorry, but I did not find any mentions of a stylish atmosphere in these reviews. I can tell you that the hotel rooms were large, clean, and had comfortable beds.
The Buckingham Hotel has an artsy and unique entrance and a small, adorable lobby with decor steeped in music. Some rooms have been renovated with fancy bathroom fixtures.
Rooms are new with nice furniture, a great bed, and a fully stocked kitchenette. The decor is cozy and beautiful.

The Carlton Arms is an artsy, funky hotel with each room uniquely designed and painted by different New York artists. It's known for its colorful and experimental atmosphere, with some rooms featuring murals and creative decor.
The Carvi Hotel is a new, renovated boutique hotel with marble bathrooms, light wood furnishings, and flat-screen TVs. Rooms include individual temperature controls and, in some cases, glass walls.

The Casablanca Hotel features a North African-inspired decor with a Moroccan theme. The hotel lobby and second-floor common room feature a stylish atmosphere and tasteful decorations, with comfortable furniture.

Chambers Hotel is a modern, stylish boutique hotel with an industrial-chic feel, featuring art pieces in the hallways, rooms with unique lighting, and concrete floors in the bathrooms. The rooms include details like a roll of drawing paper with color pencils, and the hotel provides Bumble & Bumble bath products.
Chelsea Lodge is a charming brownstone with quirky rooms and a rustic, New England-style decor. It has a doll house-like feel and is decorated with Americana-themed rooms.
Chelsea Pines Inn is a movie-themed small hotel with rooms decorated with movie posters and photos of silver screen stars. It has been recently renovated and has a stylish atmosphere.
Many reviewers mention the Chelsea Savoy is a basic, no-frills hotel. Some find it aesthetically bland, with Ikea-type furnishings, while others note recent remodeling.

The City Club Hotel has a trendy, modern decor with dark colors, mirrored walls, and unique design elements like TVs hidden behind mirrors. The rooms feature marble bathrooms and are described as masculine and stylish.
The Solita Soho is a modern, clean, and small boutique hotel with plasma TVs and sleek interior design. It has a stylish atmosphere and is located in the Soho, Little Italy, and Chinatown area.

The Club Quarters Downtown has modern, clean rooms with flat-screen TVs, and is described as sleek and professional in style. Some reviewers found the decor cool and aesthetically pleasing, while others likened it to a modern dorm room or IKEA-like furnishings.
The hotel has modern, recently renovated rooms with a contemporary design and a stylish black desk. The hotel is clean with new linens and a flat-screen TV.
The rooms are clean and modern, with chrome and dark cherrywood finishes, and are described as European modern style. There is a lounge/restaurant with a terrace.

The hotel has a marble lobby with a cute sitting area and a beautifully-restored, tin ceiling, with some rooms offering views of the Empire State Building. Some reviewers noted art deco sconces and bright apricot-painted rooms.

The Comfort Inn Manhattan has a lobby that is nicely decorated and has a fireplace; the hotel previously was a 5-star hotel called the Gregorian and retains some elegance. Some reviewers mention the hotel is older and could use remodeling.
The hotel is new and has nicely decorated rooms with modern fixtures, a divine shower head, and flat-screen TVs. The rooms are clean and well-appointed, and some offer views of the Manhattan Bridge.

This hotel is recently remodeled with attention to comfort and has contemporary, modern rooms. The hotel feels old-world classy downstairs and has been described as a gem with a professional refurbishment.
The hotel is described as new and modern in decor, with a flat-screen TV in the rooms. Rooms have granite sink tops and nice shower heads with multiple spray settings.
Rooms have been renovated with fresh colors, clean bathrooms, and good mattresses. Some rooms have fancy widescreen TVs.
The hotel has modern furnishings, flat screen TVs, and a stylish decor with marble and tile baths. Rooms are small but tastefully decorated and well-equipped.

The Cooper Square Hotel is a modern, chic hotel with a library-like lobby and rooms featuring floor-to-ceiling windows offering city views. It has a stylish bar area, though some reviewers note the hallways and elevators are dimly lit.

The Cosmopolitan Hotel has been recently renovated with modern decor, and some rooms have LCD TVs and views of the Empire State Building. Some reviewers describe the hotel as having a European, boutique style.
This is a standard business hotel without much character, but the lobby is nicely decorated with comfortable seating areas. The rooms have a stylish decor, are modern, and feature LCD TVs.
The hotel has a clean, modern lobby with plasma TVs. Rooms are furnished in a spare, modern style, and some have views of the East River.
The rooms have been renovated with a modern style and include marble countertops in the bathrooms. It has a boutique hotel feel without the glitter.
This Courtyard Marriott has been recently renovated with modern, clean rooms and many rooms offer views of the Chrysler Building. Some reviewers find the design and atmosphere "boring."

The Crosby Street Hotel is known for its stylish atmosphere, individually designed rooms, and beautiful decor, resembling a museum with art. It features tall warehouse-style windows, oak-tree floors, and a bar with a selection of wines and a bartender with a sense of humor.
The Crowne Plaza Times Square is a posh hotel with a stylish reception area, bar, and restaurant. The rooms are newly renovated and modern with chic decor.

The Da Vinci is described as a small, European-style boutique hotel with a marble and cherry wood lobby, aiming for a cozy and romantic atmosphere. Some found the decor outdated or "yard sale", while others appreciated its charm and described the lobby as beautiful.

The hotel is described as recently renovated with a lobby redone in a Jetson's-style motif. Reviews highlight the hotel's sophisticated lobby, well-maintained furnishings, abundant lamps, elegant window treatments, and newly renovated public areas.
The Doubletree Hotel Chelsea is a new, modern hotel with stylish decor, beech furniture, and flat-screen TVs. The hotel provides warm cookies at check-in and has a restaurant.

The Doubletree Metropolitan has a modern, retro-chic lobby and a trendy bar; some reviewers describe the hotel's style as elegant and funky, with recent updates. The hotel has a 1960s mid-century modern architectural style.

The Dream Hotel is a modern and stylish hotel with trendy rooms and excellent interior decorations, featuring a hip rooftop bar with great views, and a unique blue neon lighting design. The hotel has a chic lobby with a massive tropical fish tank, with a trendy style reminiscent of South Beach Miami.

The Duane Street Hotel is a modern, stylish boutique hotel with small but well-designed rooms, hardwood floors, and high ceilings. It features a contemporary lobby and restaurant with ultra-modern decor.

The Dylan Hotel is a small, modern boutique hotel with chic decor and rooms that feature elements like marble bathrooms and chemistry-themed touches such as beakers for drinking glasses. Some found the design-y style self-consciously cool, and the lighting dim.
This hotel is basic with outdated decor, and rooms are spacious, clean, and above average size. It is not luxurious, and the fitness room is claustrophobic.
I am sorry, but the reviews do not contain information about this hotel having a stylish atmosphere. The reviews focus on the hotel's great location, small rooms, cleanliness, and value for money.

This hotel has a modern, contemporary, and stylish decor and atrium, some rooms offer a view of the Hudson River, and access to the NY Sports Club. The hotel is located in lower Manhattan, near the financial district, and is a 10-15 minute walk to the nearest subway.
The Empire Hotel has a rich, hip, urban decor with dark browns and candles, as well as a trendy rooftop bar. The lobby is two-story with comfortable seating, with trendy ambiance lighting.

The Envoy Club offers spacious apartments with full kitchens, and some rooms have been refurbished with stylish decor and marble countertops. It is located within walking distance of the Empire State Building and other attractions.
The hotel has a stylish and boutique feel with very nice, modern rooms and furniture. The rooms are large and tastefully appointed.

The Excelsior Hotel features an elegant, traditional decor with mahogany and marble in the lobby and a library room. Some rooms are elegantly furnished or have pretty decorative touches, and suites are available.
The Fairfield Inn is a new hotel with modern decor and well-equipped rooms, including nice bathrooms with glass shower doors. The breakfast room is uniquely decorated.

The Fitzpatrick Grand Central features traditionally decorated rooms with cherrywood furnishings, gold-framed wall prints, and luxurious draperies. Bathrooms are often marble with high-end bath products.

The hotel is described as modern and stylish by some reviewers, with contemporary furnishings in the refurbished rooms. However, other reviews mention that the hotel is not modern or stylish, and the furniture is bland and charmless.

The Flatotel has a stylish, modern atmosphere, a sleek lobby, and trendy, minimalist decor in the renovated rooms. Some rooms have been newly refurbished, with contemporary decor, while others have older furniture and parquet floors.
This hotel has a stylish and modern decor with dark chocolate tones, and is often described as "hip". The lobby features music and a bar.
The Four Points Soho has modern, well-appointed rooms with wood and steel accents, designed in a trendy, boutique-like style. It is a new hotel with clean spaces, though some found the rooms small.

The rooms have a nice decor with a minimalist approach to decorating, plus a cool flatscreen TV on the wall. Some guests described it as a little gem for business or pleasure with nice furnishings and a modern style.
The Four Seasons New York has a stylish atmosphere, modern design by I.M. Pei, and a beautiful marble-filled lobby. Rooms are spacious and luxurious, with marble bathrooms.

Gild Hall is a boutique hotel with a stylish atmosphere, blending an old-boy British club aesthetic with Zen simplicity, featuring quirky decor like rhino footrests and antler chandeliers. The rooms have a modern, minimalist style with leather headboards and plaid throws and many common areas feature dark woods.

The Gramercy Park Hotel has a stylish and unique atmosphere with original art in the lobby, bars, and rooms, as well as interesting decorations and a mix of contemporary and gothic design. It features a Rose Bar, a Jade Bar, and a rooftop lounge/garden with a retractable roof.
The Grand Hyatt has a grand and stylish lobby and offers modern, recently remodeled rooms. Some reviewers found the decor tasteful and stylish, with recent updates such as flat screen TVs.

The Greenwich Hotel has a stylish atmosphere with European decor, hardwood floors, and rooms individually decorated in an eclectic, minimalist style. Common rooms feature comfortable chairs and couches, a wood-burning fireplace, and a courtyard.

The Hampton Inn is a modern hotel with flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, and a business center. Some reviewers note stylish decor, and that it feels more like a Hilton Garden Inn than a typical Hampton Inn.
The hotel has a minimalist chic lobby and modern rooms with flat-screen TVs. It was described as a nice travelodge.
The Hampton Inn Chelsea has modern decor, updated rooms, and stylish furnishings. Rooms include flat-screen TVs and modern bathrooms.

Hampton Inn Soho has a modern, boutique-style decor with clean lines and warm wood accents, as well as steel beams and columns in the lobby. The hotel also features a greenhouse with a stream and Buddha head.

The hotel is described as modern, clean, and new with well-lit rooms and bathrooms; rooms feature high-definition LG flatscreen TVs. Rooms are small, and the hotel is a narrow high-rise with only 6 rooms per floor.
The Hampton Inn Seaport has modern and stylishly decorated rooms with flat-screen TVs. Some rooms have terraces with views of the Brooklyn Bridge and the Seaport.

This hotel is an older property with spacious rooms, though some guests found the decor outdated. Some rooms feature flat-screen TVs, kitchenettes with mini-fridges, and views of the Chrysler Building.

The Hilton Club offers suites located on the 37th and 38th floor with a private check-in desk and small hotel personal service. Rooms are newly decorated, immaculate and beautiful with built in furnishings and glass-walled showers.

The Hilton Garden Inn Chelsea is a modern, new hotel with stylish rooms and a small, tranquil lobby. It has about 6-8 rooms per floor, each equipped with a flat-screen HDTV, microwave, and refrigerator.
The Hilton Garden Inn is a new, clean, and modern hotel with HD flat screen TVs in the rooms. The decor is contemporary, and bathrooms are stylish with glass showers.
The hotel is described as a pleasant surprise, with bright hallways decorated with black and white photos of NYC. Some reviewers mistook it for a boutique hotel due to its stylish redesign.
The Hilton Garden Inn Tribeca has a stylish atmosphere with contemporary decor and a small, modern lobby. Rooms are clean and well-decorated, with comfortable beds and high-quality linens.

The Hilton New York has a spacious and modern lobby with a lively bar, and renovated rooms with sleek, built-in furniture and modern bathrooms. Some rooms have great views of Central Park and are described as clean and cozy.
The Hilton Times Square offers a boutique hotel feel with an intimate bar off the lobby. The hotel is described as surprisingly hip and funky, with contemporary furnishings and nice art.

The Holiday Inn Express has modern, updated, and nicely furnished rooms, with premium touches, heavy wooden hangers, very good lighting, mirrors at the desk and comfortable beds with very soft linens. The decor is basic light color woods, similar to IKEA furniture.
The hotel is newly renovated with modern, clean, and bright rooms. The rooms feature simple and abstract designs, widescreen TVs, desks with modern lighting, and armoires.
The Holiday Inn Express Madison Square Garden is a new or newly renovated hotel with modern decor. The rooms are compact but well-equipped with upscale furnishings and bedding.
There is no information about the hotel having a stylish atmosphere. The hotel is located on the edge of Chinatown and near Little Italy, with subway access nearby.
The hotel has a beautiful lobby and is surprisingly beautiful. Rooms have dark (greens, deep reds, and browns) faded decor, that could use brighter lighting.
This Holiday Inn is a new hotel that opened in June 2008 and is located in the Chelsea area of Manhattan. The hotel is modern and has updated rooms.

Hotel 17 has a quirky, historic, and European-style atmosphere with dark wood trim and well-maintained shared bathrooms. The hotel's decor has been described as art deco, Victorian, funky, and straight out of a movie.
I am sorry, I cannot fulfill this request. The reviews suggest Hotel 31 is a budget hotel with old-fashioned decor, not a stylish hotel.
Hotel 373 is a modern and trendy boutique hotel with clean rooms. It has a stylish atmosphere with marble bathrooms and iPod docks.

Hotel 41 is a trendy, small boutique hotel with a retro lounge and a stylish and modern bar, and several reviewers describe the rooms as simply decorated. Some reviewers note the Aveda bath products and fluffy white robes.
Hotel 99 has modern, well-decorated rooms equipped with large LCD TVs and bathrooms with glass door enclosed showers and bathtubs. Some reviewers noted intricate stonework in the bathrooms.

The Beacon Hotel has renovated rooms with modern, comfortable furnishings and Art Deco style in earth tones, with some rooms having views of Central Park or the Hudson River. Some reviewers note the lobby is newly renovated and nicely presented, while rooms have been upgraded with flat screen TVs, iPod docking stations, and marble bathrooms.

Hotel Chandler is a stylish boutique hotel with beautiful decor in every room, modern renovated rooms, and a cozy little bar. It has been described as having an art deco design, a sophisticated feel and a library with local papers.
Hotel has an "Old World" feel with eclectic, large rooms at the front and purple bathrooms. It features a manual operated lift and is reminiscent of small inexpensive hotels in London or Paris.

The East Houston Hotel is a modern, chic, and stylish hotel with Asian minimalist decor, cherry wood floors, and a rooftop lounge. The hotel has a boutique vibe, with attractive decor in the flock wallpapered style favored by boutique hotel proprietors.
Hotel Elysee has a European, old-world charm with elegant, tastefully decorated rooms featuring antiques and marble bathrooms. The hotel has been described as quaint, cozy, and having a French style.

The Gansevoort Hotel features modern, minimalist decor, and rooms with flat-screen TVs, stereos with CD changers, iPod docking stations, and granite bathroom floors. It has a trendy atmosphere, and is described as a club with a hotel attached and very chic with a funky entrance and lobby.

Hotel Giraffe is a stylish, modern boutique hotel with art deco and European-style decor. It has a lobby lounge area with piano music, a rooftop garden, and rooms with elegant furnishings and Juliet balconies.

This budget-friendly hotel is clean and well-maintained, although the decor is dated; rooms include a TV, fridge, and air conditioning. The Grand Union Hotel is near subway lines and within walking distance of the Empire State Building and Times Square.
Hotel Indigo has a modern, minimalist interior design with a cool bar and restaurant. The rooms have a 32" plasma TV and stylish decor.
Hotel Mela is a modern boutique hotel with stylish and tastefully done decor. The hotel has small but immaculate rooms and a trendy lobby.

The Hotel Metro has a 1940s art deco theme and is decorated in an Art Deco style with film posters; some rooms are a little dated. The lobby is decorated in an Art Deco style and it looked like a stylish boutique hotel.
I am sorry, but none of the reviews mention a stylish atmosphere. The hotel is a budget-friendly option that's clean and conveniently located near the subway.
The Hotel on Rivington is a modern, sleek hotel with a stylish atmosphere and unique rooms. Rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with great views.
Hotel Reserve is a modern hotel with new furnishings and a stylish atmosphere. Rooms are well-designed with flat-screen TVs and upscale bathroom amenities.

The hotel is a budget option, with a location near Times Square, and undergoing renovations; some rooms are renovated, clean, and of an adequate size, but without luxurious amenities. The hotel generally lacks stylish features, but the lobby has wood and marble features, and it provides access to city attractions.
The Stanford Hotel has a lobby with a 1920s art deco feel and a bar that specializes in jazz and karaoke. Some rooms have been newly decorated with flat screen TVs and marble bathrooms.

Hotel Wales has a charming and quaint style with dark wood and east coast type furniture. The hotel is decorated with delicately carved wooden furniture and fresh flowers, with a lobby that has a tiny bit of a hip style to it.

The Hudson Hotel has exposed brick and glass covered with ivy in the lobby creating a trendy and urban chic atmosphere. The hotel is unmarked, with dark hallways and small, though clean, stylish, and well-decorated rooms.

Ink48 is a new, modern hotel with stylish rooms, funky lobbies, and floor-to-ceiling windows with city and river views. The rooms feature unique designs, comfortable furniture, and large bathrooms with L'Occitane bath products.

The Inn New York City is a stylish inn with uniquely decorated suites in a converted townhouse, featuring antiques, fireplaces, and stained glass. The Inn offers a "home away from home" atmosphere, with kitchens stocked with treats and a quiet, residential location near Central Park and the subway.
The Barclay Intercontinental has an old-fashioned ambience, a grand lobby, and is known for its elegant and stylish decor. The hotel is also known for its top-of-the-line service.
The hotel features Art Deco design, stylishly decorated rooms with modern amenities, including LCD Touchscreen telephones,mood lighting, and Plasma TVs. The bar is lively and interesting.

The Kitano is a Japanese-themed hotel with a lobby featuring a Botero fat cat sculpture, a jazz lounge, and a Japanese restaurant. Some rooms offer views of the Empire State Building or the Chrysler Building.
Some reviewers note that the hotel has a roof top bar with a view of the Empire State Building. The lobby has an Art Deco design.

The Lafayette House is a quirky, charming boutique hotel in an old building with rooms decorated in an eclectic, antique style, some featuring sitting areas with fireplaces and kitchenettes. It is located in the East Village, close to various restaurants and attractions.

Le Parker Meridien boasts a stylish and modern atmosphere, with a beautiful lobby and rooms that have a Mad Men retro feel or Bauhaus style. It features a beautiful bar, a Burger Joint, cartoons in the elevators, and a rooftop pool with amazing views.

The Library Hotel features a stylish atmosphere with individually styled and decorated rooms according to different book themes. The property includes a rooftop bar and cozy reading room on the second floor.
The Loews Regency has a bustling lobby with historical touches in the public spaces. The rooms are spacious, and well-appointed with Jonathan Adler pottery in some rooms.

The Lowell is an intimate hotel with rooms that are tastefully decorated, recently renovated, and feature kitchenettes and marble bathrooms. The Pembroke Room is decorated in light spring colors and mirrored, offering a setting for breakfast and afternoon tea.

The Mandarin Oriental has a stylish atmosphere and a modern design with an Asian touch, as well as a lobby with high ceilings and great views. Rooms feature floor to ceiling windows and are equipped with HDTVs and sound systems.

Many reviewers note that the hotel is old and in need of renovation, but that the lobby is nice; descriptions of room decor include terms like "drab," "shabby," and "tired." The rooms feature flat screen TVs and some have kitchenettes.
The Millenium Hilton is a sleek, modern hotel with spacious rooms and a stylish atmosphere, featuring large flat-screen TVs. Rooms are decorated in a contemporary style and have modern furnishings.
The Millennium Broadway is a modern hotel with stylish rooms. It has an art deco lobby with a dark marble design.
The hotel is modern and minimalistic, featuring mirrors and marble, and offers city skyline or East River views. Rooms have LCD TVs and some have kitchenettes.

The Moderne Hotel is a small, retro-style hotel with Andy Warhol-themed decor, including Marilyn Monroe pictures and silver leather headboards. Some rooms have been upgraded with LCD TVs, and there is a library with floor-to-ceiling windows and an internet cafe.

Morgans Hotel has a stylish atmosphere, modern decor with a black and white theme, and design details like a moving checkerboard display. The rooms are nicely furnished and have mood lighting options.
I am sorry, the reviews do not mention that this hotel has a stylish atmosphere. The reviews mention that the hotel is clean, comfortable, and has large rooms.
I am sorry, but there is no information about the hotel having a stylish atmosphere.

The Marriott Downtown is a modern and clean hotel with recently renovated rooms, offering flat-screen TVs, iHome clock/radios, and modern bathrooms. The hotel features a lively cocktail bar, a restaurant with a nice atmosphere, and offers various views including the Hudson River and the Statue of Liberty.

The hotel lobby has an old-world charm with vintage woods & brass, and the bar/lounge area is nicely spaced, but the bar scene might be boring for some. The rooms have a smallish size and are stylish, with many recently renovated.

The Marriott Marquis is a large, modern hotel with decor that some find beautiful, luxurious, and spacious, while others consider it dated or institutional. It has multiple restaurants, shops and bars including a revolving restaurant with great views of the city.

The New York Palace has a beautiful lobby with a sweeping staircase and opulent Christmas decorations, and the Gilt bar has a trendy atmosphere with amazing desserts. Many reviewers noted a classy or elegant public spaces in the hotel, though the style in the rooms varied from classic to modern.

The Night Hotel has a trendy, gothic, and sexy atmosphere with black and white decor, a sleek lobby, and a small bar area, and the rooms have design elements such as plasma TVs and Bose sound systems. Some reviewers noted that the hotel may be better suited for younger travelers due to the suggestive photos and style.
The hotel has a beautiful lobby with a nice bar and an outdoor terrace with views of Times Square. The rooms are modern with flat screen TVs, and some rooms have Times Square views.
Off Soho Suites offers apartment-like suites that are clean, fashionable, bright, and beautifully decorated. Some reviewers found the hotel posh and romantic.
The hotel has a stylish atmosphere and has a comfortable lobby bar. It's been renovated with luxury amenities and marble bathrooms.
On The Ave is a modern, stylish boutique hotel with sleek, minimalist d√©cor and an urban feel. It is located on the Upper West Side, is close to subway stations, and offers a rooftop terrace.
Park 79 is an old building, formerly a house, with charming interiors that are a bit on the old side. Some reviewers mention sleek and modern decor, and marble tile in the bathrooms.

The hotel lobby is described as nice, trendy, welcoming, spacious, and having a modern decor, with some reviewers noting a recent remodel. The hotel has a design-conscious lobby and bar, with a stone facade entrance.

The Park South Hotel has a stylish atmosphere, an art deco style, is nicely decorated, and has a lounge with a fireplace. The Black Duck lounge/restaurant has live jazz on weekends and is lit with candles.

The Peninsula exudes a quiet, understated sophistication, with elegant public areas featuring dark wood and olive green carpeting. The hotel is designed to feel more like a private club than a hotel, with intimate seating areas.

The Phillips Club offers stylish, modern rooms/suites with great big flat-screens, Bose sound systems, and attractive lighting. Its lobby is stunning, and it is popular with New Yorkers between homes and movie/TV stars.

The Plaza Athenee has an intimate, European, residential feel with tasteful decor and French furniture. Its dining room is one of the prettiest in Manhattan, featuring Murano glass chandeliers and mirrored alcoves.

Some past guests found the lobby lovely and the bar expensive, while others describe a more average atmosphere and decor that is in need of updating. The lobby is small and often crowded, and the hotel has a room next to the lobby with computers for internet use.
Rooms have been renovated over the last 6 months with a contemporary design. Rooms are decorated in sage green, dark brown, and oatmeal colors and have new flat screen TVs.
The Red Roof Inn Manhattan has newly renovated rooms with flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, and modern bathrooms. Some rooms have views of the Empire State Building.

Hotel 57, a recently renovated boutique hotel, features a sleek and modern decor with a European feel, known for its intimate and personal atmosphere and stylish design. The hotel includes modern rooms, a bar/restaurant, and is located near shopping and attractions.

The Renaissance Times Square is a modern, stylish hotel with double-glazed windows for quiet rooms. The hotel has a unique lobby with a futuristic decor, accented with X-like sculptures and modern furnishings.

The hotel is modern with comfortable beds and flat-screen TVs, with a lounge area on the 3rd floor that has cozy seating and a bar. Rooms include attractive granite kitchens and decor, and the location is central.
The Ritz-Carlton Battery Park has an art deco fashion and elegantly styled large rooms. Some common rooms have art deco decor, and stylish rooms are elegantly appointed with quality furnishings.
The hotel has modern furnishings, is newly built as of 2006, and has a stylish atmosphere. Rooms are well-designed with flat screen TVs and modern bathrooms.
The Roger Smith Hotel is a boutique hotel with unique accents in each room, boasting a rotating art exhibit and sculptures. Rooms are decorated differently and feature books, art, and antiques.

The Roger Williams is a trendy boutique hotel with an eclectic feel and a stylish atmosphere with bright colors and modern decor. The lobby is gorgeous and decorated with style, with warm lighting and cozy places to sit.
This hotel has a trendy style, modern and minimalist decor, and a funky communal area including a pool, bar, sauna, and steam room. The style is European, with a quirky and zen ambiance.

The Royalton is a modern, trendy hotel known for its dark, moody, and hip atmosphere, with a popular bar and lounge area. It has a discreet entrance, sleek design, and rooms feature details like fireplaces and mirrored mosaic tile.

These hotel reviews do not contain sufficient information to provide a summary related to the query. The reviews mention that it is not a modern hotel, but has old charm, is clean, spacious, and comfortable.

The San Carlos Hotel has a modern, clean, and stylish atmosphere after recent renovations, with tastefully decorated rooms and public areas. The hotel features well-appointed rooms and common areas with good service.

The Seafarers International House provides basic, clean rooms with options for shared or private bathrooms. It has amenities such as free internet in the lobby, TV in the rooms, and is located near Union Square.
The lobby has been recently renovated with a contemporary internet lounge/bar/coffee area. The hotel offers flat-screen TVs and Bliss toiletries in some rooms.
The hotel has an art deco feel in the lobby and quiet bar, with nice plasma TVs, decor, and flat-screen TVs in the lobby and rooms. Some rooms have been renovated and have a modern bath.

The Smyth Tribeca is a modern, stylish hotel with a chic lobby and well-designed rooms featuring dark wood, marble bathrooms, and comfortable beds. Some rooms have open-concept bathrooms with frosted glass showers.

The Sofitel is described as having a chic, understated, luxurious, and elegant atmosphere with art-deco lobbies, classical music, scented candles, fresh flowers, Bose sound systems, European styling, and a French vibe. The hotel is modern and well-maintained with recent renovations and is frequented by European guests.

The Soho Grand Hotel has a stylish atmosphere, industrial-chic decor and a trendy bar that attracts a hip clientele. Some found the hotel to be in a cool location, a really nice place, and a great, hip, trendy place.

Soho House New York is a trendy hotel and private club with stylish decor, vintage furniture, and spacious, individual rooms featuring great sound systems and oversized baths. The rooftop bar is fashionable with great views, and the hotel also has a spa.

Stay Hotel has a trendy and modern lobby with funky lighting, aquariums, and a bar/restaurant called Aspen Social Club with a lodge-like theme; some rooms have been renovated, and the hotel is located close to Times Square. The hotel is known for its small rooms, slow elevators, and potential noise from the downstairs bar, but the location is excellent for Broadway shows and other attractions.

The Alex Hotel is a modern, stylish boutique hotel with well-appointed rooms, Frette linens, and Frederic Fekkai toiletries, with flat-screen TVs in the bedroom and bathroom. Some rooms have kitchens with Sub-Zero refrigerators.
The Belvedere Hotel features an Art Deco style lobby and a stylish atmosphere. Executive rooms have been renovated with marble bathrooms and flat-screen TVs.

The Benjamin has a Beaux Arts-style lobby and elegant rooms, some of which have balconies. The hotel is considered a boutique hotel with a stylish atmosphere, but some reviewers say the decor is a little dated and could use an update.
The Blakely Hotel is a small boutique hotel with a European-style lobby and rooms that feature English Colonial decor. Rooms are well-appointed and modern, with flat-screen TVs and spa toiletries.

The Bowery Hotel features stylish decor with an old British touch, old-world charm, a cozy bar, and a Moroccan-style lounge area with a fireplace. Rooms have hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, and comfortable beds with high-quality linens.

The Bryant Park Hotel is a trendy and modern hotel with red and black decor, and features like red-lit elevators with music, and hip-looking staff. The hotel's trendy atmosphere and nightclub-like atmosphere make it popular with a younger, stylish crowd.

The Carlton on Madison is a stylish hotel with a grand and atmospheric lobby, and rooms with art deco and modern design elements; many reviewers mention it is newly renovated. Some corridors have a "creepy Ghostbusters looking" aesthetic.

The Carlyle is a classic, old-school luxury hotel known for its stylish art deco lobby, white-gloved elevator operators, and live jazz at the Cafe Carlyle. Rooms are traditionally decorated and evoke the feeling of a private residence.
The Franklin Hotel has a European feel with chandeliers, Bulgari toiletries, cashmere throws, and embroidered linens. The hotel is decorated with antiques and floral prints.

The French Quarters Guest Apartments is a stylishly decorated hotel with rooms featuring New Orleans-themed decor, chic bathrooms, and kitchenettes. The hotel has a warm ambiance, a hopping adjacent pub, and is located in the heart of the Theater District.

The Gem Hotel Chelsea has a modern, clean, and stylish design with a boutique feel and European flare. The lobby sells local art, and rooms feature bright white decor, flat-screen TVs, iPod docking stations, and Gilchrist and Soames toiletries.
The GEM Hotel has a stylish and modern minimalist aesthetic with black-and-white decor and a splash of red. It features amenities suited to higher-end hotels, such as bathrobes and flatscreen TVs.

The Gem Hotel Soho has compact but stylish rooms with modern decor, including flat-screen TVs. It aims for a boutique feel with a chic ambiance and is located near trendy areas with clubs, restaurants, and shopping.
The hotel has been recently renovated, with nice carpeting and wooden mouldings in the hallway. Some rooms have modern furnishings with pictures on the wall.
The Hampton Inn has a stylish lobby and modern rooms that have been recently renovated. Some reviewers also mentioned that the facility was perfect, clean, and well-decorated.

The Helmsley Carlton House is located one block from Central Park and offers spacious rooms, including junior suites and one-bedroom apartments, some with kitchenettes and balconies. Reviews mention the hotel's beautiful decor, penthouse-like feel, and recent refurbishment of some rooms.

The Helmsley Park Lane features old-style elegant rooms and a beautiful lobby, but many guests describe the decor as dated, with some rooms containing 1970s-style elements like mirrored ceilings, purple carpets, and floral wallpaper. Some guests found the decor charming and palatial, while others found it kitsch and worn.

The Herald Square Hotel has renovated rooms that include modern furniture, new marble bathrooms, chandeliers, comfortable beds, flat-screen TVs, and a Life Magazine theme. Some rooms have high ceilings and Victorian-style amenities.
Hotel 91 is a modern hotel with Asian accents and a marble counter in the bathroom. The lobby has a lounge area with a flatscreen TV and a mix of old and new furniture.

The Hotel at Times Square has been recently remodeled with a modern design, including flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, and updated bathrooms. The lobby has a sleek, modern design and there is a small bar with cheap martinis.
The Inn at Irving Place features authentic 19th-century decor and handsome antiques. It is furnished with antiques that have some nicks and is located in a beautiful brownstone.

The Iroquois is a beautifully decorated, classy, and elegant boutique hotel with classic furnishings and a sophisticated ambiance. The lobby was recently redone and is sophisticated without being pretentious.

The Jane Hotel offers a retro and quirky, stylish atmosphere with cabin-like rooms reminiscent of early 20th-century ship cabins, wood-paneled walls, and old-school decor. The hotel includes a manually operated elevator and a bar with a funky, eclectic decor.
The Kimberly Hotel is described as a classic NYC hotel, with ornate furnishings. Some rooms have been recently updated with regal New York City apartment-style decor and marble bathrooms.

The Lombardy is a boutique hotel where each room is individually owned and decorated with different themes that are controlled centrally by the hotel management and updated on a regular basis with high-end, custom or semi-custom design. Some rooms have been described as modern and delightful, while others have been described as dated.
The London NYC is a modern and chic hotel with spacious, stylish rooms. The hotel features a sleek bar, Gordon Ramsay restaurants, and a convenient midtown location.

The Lucerne is a traditionally decorated hotel with elegant, meticulously decorated rooms and business facilities. The hotel has been beautifully restored and offers a home-like atmosphere with decor and amenities.

The Manhattan Club is undergoing remodeling, with remodeled rooms featuring above-average decor, though some rooms face inwards and receive little light. Rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and Bath & Body Works amenities.

The Mansfield Hotel is a boutique hotel with a stylish, European feel, marble entrance hall, a library/lounge, and a bar area with live jazz. Rooms feature Aveda toiletries, flat-screen TVs, hardwood floors, and modern decor.
The Marcel at Gramercy is a modern boutique hotel with funky, stylish, and minimalist decor. The lobby is hip and stylish, and rooms have a 'boutique' feel.
The Maritime Hotel has a nautical theme throughout, with rooms designed like ship cabins featuring porthole windows. The hotel has a hip, retro look with a lively bar and Japanese restaurant.
The Mark is located on the Upper East Side and was recently renovated with a modern design. The rooms are large with marble bathrooms that include a TV in the mirror.
The Marmara Manhattan is a modern, upscale extended stay hotel with spacious suites, full kitchens, and stylish furnishings. The hotel has a museum quality lobby and a small gallery.
The hotel has a modern style and vibrant colors in the lobby with red and white decor. The hotel feel is chic and stylish with rooms that shine.

The Mercer is a trendy, understated boutique hotel with chic decor, a relaxed lobby, and minimalist rooms. It has architectural features like high ceilings and large windows and is frequented by celebrities.
The Michelangelo Hotel has a beautiful lobby and an Italian-inspired atmosphere with elegant, spacious rooms. The hotel is centrally located near Times Square and Broadway.
I am sorry, but none of the reviews mention a stylish atmosphere. They focus on the hotel's value, location, and spaciousness.
The Muse Hotel is a modern, trendy hotel with an art deco theme, featuring creative and comfy decor. It has a charming and luxurious atmosphere with a stylish lobby and bar, and renovated rooms.

Some reviewers found the New York Helmsley to have a stylish atmosphere and old New York decor, but others found it dated and in need of a makeover. Rooms featured flat screen TVs and marble bathrooms.
The New Yorker Hotel has an art deco style and has been recently renovated. Many rooms offer views of the Empire State Building, Chrysler building, or Hudson River.
The Pierre is a luxurious hotel with classic yet contemporary rooms, elegant furniture, crown moldings, and a marble lobby. It features a new restaurant and lobby bar that appear to be quite popular.

The Plaza Hotel boasts a stylish atmosphere with spacious rooms, beautiful mosaic-tiled bathrooms featuring gold-plated fixtures, elegant architectural details, and high-tech amenities. The hotel's public spaces include a stunning lobby with fresh flowers, the Rose Club lounge, and a stained-glass ceiling in the Palm Court.
The Pod Hotel has a funky and stylish atmosphere with a roof terrace and outdoor spaces. The lobby has murals, and music is played in the hallways and bathrooms.

The Premier is described as a boutique hotel within the Millennium Broadway, with modern and serene rooms that are thoughtfully laid out. Some rooms offer views of the Chrysler Building and Times Square, and the hotel provides a complimentary continental breakfast and evening drinks.
The Ritz-Carlton Central Park is described as elegant, luxurious, and stylish, with tastefully decorated rooms and public spaces. The hotel has a sophisticated lobby bar and offers park-view rooms.
The Roosevelt Hotel features a grand lobby reminiscent of the 1930s and boasts a rooftop bar with panoramic city views. The hotel has a classic, old New York style with elegant and ornate decor.

The Sherry-Netherland is a small, luxurious hotel with individually owned and furnished rooms in a traditional style, some of which have park views, fresh flowers, and chocolates. The elevators feature hand-painted details with medieval-style art, and the hotel evokes an old Hollywood film atmosphere.
The Shoreham is a modern, trendy boutique hotel with minimalist decor, and a stylish lobby and lounge area. Some rooms include massage chairs, Aveda products, and Bose sound systems.

The St. Regis is known for its classic, old-world glamour and European-style luxury, with traditionally decorated rooms featuring elegant furnishings and marble bathrooms. Some find the decor a bit tired or old-fashioned, while others appreciate the grand and luxurious ambiance.

The Standard Hotel in NYC has a modern and trendy design, with floor-to-ceiling windows offering great views. It is known for its unique architecture and stylish public spaces, including video art in the elevators and a hip bar scene.
The Surrey is an elegant, classy, and modern hip hotel with sophisticated decor and unique art pieces. The hotel is furnished and decorated in a luxurious style.

Sylvan Guest House features apartments with African art decorations, well-equipped kitchens, luxury bathrooms and living rooms. The townhouse is exquisitely designed with a brand new modern kitchen and baths, as well as a charming deck.

The Time Hotel is a modern, sophisticated boutique hotel with rooms decorated in red, blue, or yellow and features a trendy bar/lounge. It is located just around the corner from Times Square in the heart of the Theater District.

The Waldorf Astoria is a grand, historic hotel known for its beautiful Art Deco lobby, public spaces, and ballrooms. It evokes a sense of old-world charm and elegance, with spacious rooms, though some find the decor in need of updating.

The Westin New York Times Square is a modern hotel with a sleek design, contemporary decor, large windows, and rooms that include stainless steel fixtures and ipod docking stations. Some reviewers found the style cold or minimalist, while others appreciated the vintage edge and vintage revival style.

The Hotel Thirty Thirty is a small boutique hotel with a hip, minimalist lobby design and sleek accommodations. Some reviewers found the reception area trendy, while others thought it had an industrial feel with zero atmosphere.

The Thompson LES is a modern and trendy hotel with sleek, minimalist decor and floor-to-ceiling windows offering great city views. It is located in the Lower East Side, close to bars, restaurants, and shops.

The Travel Inn offers a clean and basic lodging option with features such as a pool, fitness room, TV with games, and wireless internet, but lacks a stylish atmosphere. Reviews mention that the rooms are dated and basic with small bathrooms, but they are clean and a good value for the location.

The Tribeca Grand is a trendy hotel with a stylish atmosphere, loft-like rooms, plasma TVs, CD players, and modern decor. The hotel is also known for its soaring atrium lobby, bar scene, and friendly service.

The Trump International Hotel features modern and clean rooms with high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, and flat-screen TVs. Some rooms have been recently redecorated, featuring subtle inferences of the Trump diamond logo.
The Tudor Hotel has a boutique style, historic building and has been recently renovated with modern bathrooms. The lobby has a cute style, with nice seating.

The Avalon, now the Vincci Avalon, is a stylish but dated boutique-type hotel with opulent entrances, marble, and mirrors that some guests describe as having a European or Georgian distressed elegance. The rooms include free wireless internet, flat-screen LCD TVs, iPod docking stations, and updated bathrooms with jacuzzi tubs and separate showers.
The W The Court is a trendy hotel with a stylish atmosphere, a hip bar, and modern decor. It has a dimly lit lobby with fresh orchids and contemporary design, and the elevators play techno music.
The W Tuscany is a stylish hotel with modern decor, trendy black and red accents, and sleek rooms. It has a small, chic lobby with scented candles and a busy bar at night.

W Times Square is a trendy and modern hotel with sleek decor, a hip lobby bar, and uniquely designed rooms, but some guests find it dark. The hotel's style includes a waterfall entrance, contemporary/loft feel, a grey/taupe color scheme, glass-walled bathrooms, and sometimes "Bliss"ful bathrooms.
The W Union Square is a stylish hotel with a trendy atmosphere, a lively lobby bar, and a basement lounge. The hotel has modern decor, well-designed rooms, and uniquely styled common areas.

The Waldorf Towers is described as having an old-world charm and elegance, with art deco details, spacious rooms, and marble bathrooms. Some reviewers mention that the decor is from the 1920s and some furnishings look antique.

The Wall Street Inn is a small, quaint, boutique-type hotel with a charming mix of colonial and turn-of-the-(20th)century era wallpapering and linens, and stylish rooms. The design is boutique old world European, with muted floral bedspread and drapes, tasteful artwork, and matching furniture.

The Warwick is a historic hotel with a classy atmosphere, old-world charm, beautiful lobbies, and a cozy bar with leather couches. Some rooms have art deco style and plasma TVs, while Murals on 54 restaurant features murals painted for William Randolph Hearst.

The Washington Jefferson is described as a boutique hotel with a modern look, marble floors, and stylishly appointed rooms with a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. The lobby is simple but elegant, and some rooms feature recently upgraded bathrooms with marble.

The Washington Square Hotel is a charming hotel with an Art Deco style, featuring a lobby with a mix of Art Nouveau and Art Deco elements, dark colors, enameling, and rich velvets. The rooms are described as having 1930s-style decor and movie idol pictures.
The hotel has an Art Deco lobby and a Greek restaurant, Molyvos. Some reviewers mention the old-fashioned decor in some areas.
The hotel has a modern and contemporary building design with artist drawings. Rooms feature hardwood floors, marble showers, and technological enhancements.
The Wyndham Midtown is a rehabbed hotel with new bedding and carpeting and spacious bathrooms. It has clean, smartly styled rooms and unpretentious elegance.
The Wolcott Hotel is a historic hotel with a beautiful Beaux-Arts lobby, pre-war New York ambiance, and a ballroom. It is described as old, having character, and "shabby chic".

Woogo Central Park is located in an apartment building and offers apartment-style accommodations with kitchenettes, with some rooms having skyline views and rooftop terraces. The lobby is newly renovated and has a modern look.

The Wyndham Garden Hotel Times Square South is a modern, new hotel with stylish and well-designed rooms, 
offering a chic and trendy vibe, a cool rooftop bar, and a greenhouse-style restaurant. It offers a comfortable and clean base for exploring the city.
